divs: sighting detailsi was sitting in the living room, right next to the large sliding glass door\window. as i was watching a movie, i notice an incredibly bright glow out of the corner of my eye. i turned and looked (but not through the glass, the door was open so there was no reflection,) and witnessed a large white globe of light. it had a lime green glowing outline, with what appeared to be neon green flames coming off of it. it had a long tale, that left mini trails as it went along. it was going north east, made no sound, and appeared to be about the size of a two story house. and that was from about one to two miles away. it lasted about seven to ten minutes, and i lost site of it when it disappeared behind some homes.
Summary: Glowing ball of light with lime and neon green flames
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Lincoln
There were no other sightings in Lincoln on or around September 28th 2011
